description: The BBC will show the second Nations Fight Night event 8 February, including Matty McHale's headline bout with Brandon Doard.
title: BBC to show Nations Fight Night at East Kilbride
title_page: BBC to show Nations Fight Night at East Kilbride, including Matty McHale fight - BBC Sport
maintext:
BBC to show Nations Fight Night at East Kilbride
Published
14 January 2025
The second Nations Fight Night event at East Kilbride's Playsport will be shown live on the BBC on Saturday, 8 February.
Unbeaten Edinburgh fighter Matty McHale fights Liverpudlian Brandon Doard in the headline British super-flyweight title bout, and there will be a Celtic light-heavyweight title match-up between Glaswegian Bobby Morrell and Swansea's Aaron Bird.
The first ever women's Celtic title between Glasgow's Cassidy Todd and Victoria Perkins, of Swansea, is also on the bill.
Scot Jake Limond, son of the late WBU lightweight champion Willie, will be contesting his first professional title against Daniel Quaye of Ghana.
Meanwhile, Newarthill's Martin Crossan has a rematch with Yorkshire's Kurt Jackson.
The fights will be shown on the BBC Scotland Channel, BBC Two Wales, BBC Two Northern Ireland and the iPlayer.
